trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje kompozycji podczas zdarzenia wejściowego tekstu z <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is a FrameworkTextComposition when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Właściwość jest FrameworkTextComposition, gdy użytkownik wprowadzi tekst do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>za pomocą [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] i <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, lub <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>zdarzenie.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: FrameworkTextComposition is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: FrameworkTextComposition jest klasą podstawową <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>Klasa definiuje właściwości, które zwracają <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>obiektów, aby wskazać położenie układu tekstu.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: Kiedy użytkownik wprowadzi tekst w <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>jest <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Finalizes the composition.
trans-unit.target: Kończenie znajdujących się w kompozycji.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera długość bieżącego kompozycji w symbole Unicode.

trans-unit.source: The CompositionLength property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość CompositionLength wskazuje, ile znaków zostały wprowadzone od ostatniej <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ta właściwość jest znaczący tylko w przypadku <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>lub <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>zdarzenie.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, CompositionLength is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>wystąpi zdarzenie, -1, jest CompositionLength i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>właściwość wskazuje długość kompozycji.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionLength wprowadzono w programie .NET Framework w wersji 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz [wersje i zależności](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Długość bieżącego kompozycji w symbole Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera pozycję, w którym tekst kompozycji odbywa się w <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ta właściwość jest znaczący tylko w przypadku <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>lub <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>zdarzenie.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>wystąpi zdarzenie, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A>-1 i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A>właściwość wskazuje położenie tekstu kompozycji.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionOffset wprowadzono w programie .NET Framework w wersji 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz [wersje i zależności](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pozycja, jaką tekst kompozycji występuje w <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera długość ukończone tekstu w formacie Unicode symboli, kiedy <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>zdarzenie.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, ResultLength is –1.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>lub <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>wystąpi zdarzenie, ResultLength-1.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultLength wprowadzono w programie .NET Framework w wersji 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz [wersje i zależności](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Symbole długość ukończone tekstu w formacie Unicode, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>zdarzenie.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera Przesunięcie tekstu ukończone podczas <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>zdarzenie.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>lub <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>wystąpi zdarzenie, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>-1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultOffset wprowadzono w programie .NET Framework w wersji 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz [wersje i zależności](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Przesunięcie tekstu ukończone podczas <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>zdarzenie.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>
